job_title: New College Grad - Process Integration Engineer
job_description:
• New College Grad - Diffusion Equipment EngineerManassas, Virginia, United States of AmericaPosted 13 days ago Bachelor’s degree in Materials Science, Electrical, Electronics, Chemical, or related engineering fields.
• Internship experience in a 300mm semiconductor environment.
• Be prepared to work a shifted schedule as required.
• New College Grad - ATE Process Engineer ID1Boise, Idaho, United States of AmericaPosted 3 days ago New College Grad - R2R EngineerManassas, Virginia, United States of AmericaPosted 13 days ago Start up, develop, and optimize processes for product quality and reliability.
• Run Design of Experiments (DOE) to enhance process capability and margin.
• Ability to support SPC/FDC/RMS/APC systems and site-to-site portability.
• Address top detractors to improve device yield and reliability.

• Minimum QualificationsBachelor of Computer Science or equivalent skills and work experienceFoundation for growth — you have 1-3 years of software engineering experience and are ready to take on increasing responsibility.
